channel.title: Forum Mafia: Vampire The Masquerade Canned
channel.description:
# Welcome to Forum Mafia game
https://camo.derpicdn.net/df92fdd518e4a1d2b6099a92f446e08f83584a7f?url=http%3A%2F%2Ffc07.deviantart.net%2Ffs70%2Ff%2F2012%2F287%2Ff%2F5%2Fvampire_the_masquerade___bloodlines_by_gg_by_byggeniuses-d5hqqpu.jpg
[color=darkred][i]Vampires. Or we refer ourselves as "Kindred", have living since dawn of time of human civilization. Through out the era's we lived under the cover of nights and pray on unfortunate victims to sustain our thirst of blood until next night calls.[/i][/color]
[color=darkred][i]Now in present day where mobile phone cells and computers connected to World Wide Web internet monitors the lives of our livestock, it's harder to go unnoticed than it was in much simpler times however we can use their methods against them and let us satisfy our desire to drink them dry, hehehehe.[/i][/color]
[color=darkred][i]We are tight-knotted community, kid. But recently we're way too few of us left alive to defend ourselves from the dangers not just any other damned creatures of the night, the humans--no, ourselves are threat too if we play too much of Jyrad, the secret war.[/i][/color]
[color=darkred][i]Ah but you're way too inexperienced to understand any of this, hah hah. Good luck.[/i][/color]
## [color=darkred]Rules[/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
## [color=darkred]Gameplay[/color]
There are only Night Phases that lasts 24 hours long. The player with majority vote or through plurality for most votes gets lynched at end of night Vampires won't kill Human Villagers but bite to convert them. All dead players will talk through a Forum PM. Vampires are given Villager Cards for fakeclaiming
When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it. Once at least 12 players signed in, a timer of 24 hours will commence that will lock the sign ups thread for letting more players signing in once this ends.
## [color=darkred]Executions[/color]
To accuse someone say /Accuse [Player] or /Vote [Player] in bold with pinging my name @Frostwolf103 by typing @ Frostwolf103, this way I can keep track on the votes.
The accused player are allowed to have any last words before execution will commence.
## [color=Darkred]Gameplay mechanics[/color]
1. Vampires can only bite one player per three nights 2. The bite action done by vampires through target vote in their separate chat PM. 3. The new converted vampire will know they have turned by start of next night. 4. This is mostly vanilla based town but only one or few villagers have a weapon. 5. The only way to kill a vampire is when they try to bite a villager with hidden weapon. 6. Vampires and Villagers have no other abilities to use, you can only vote your opponents.
## [color=darkred]To join[/color]
To join, simply express in joining by saying something like /I want to join or /join or /in or /sign me up, coach. You must type it in bold.
## [color=darkred]Class list[/color]
# [The setup is closed]
# [color=Darkred]Player List[/color]
1: BlueStorm 2: PoisonedSquid 3: H_Hjasik 4: Blizer 5: 6: 7: Margaret 8: MaximusPrime 9: an_gorta_pratai 10: WazzaAzza 11: Sam17z 12:
# [color=green]Spectators[/color] Geyde
## Timestamps
## Graveyard
Frostwolf103 - Killed at N0 - [color=grey]**The host curse**[/color]
